name.title: Service name
name.description: The name of the CouchDB service instance

user.title: User
user.description: The user that the service will run as.

service_account.description: The service account for DC/OS service authentication. This is typically left empty to use the default unless service authentication is needed. The value given here is passed as the principal of Mesos framework.

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin. Comma-separated key:value pairs. For example: k_0:v_0,k_1:v_1,...,k_n:v_n

service_account_secret.title: Credential secret name (optional)
service_account_secret.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

mesos_api_version.description: Configures the Mesos API version to use. Possible values: V0 (non-HTTP), V1 (HTTP)

log_level.description: The log level for the DC/OS service.

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of CouchDB nodes in the cluster

placement_constraint.title: Placement constraint
placement_constraint.description: Marathon-style placement constraint for nodes. Example: 'hostname:UNIQUE'

cpus.title: CPU count
cpus.description: Number of cpu shares allocated to the CouchDB process

mem.title: Memory size (MB)
mem.description: Amount of memory allocated to the CouchDB process (in MB)

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: Amount of disk space allocated to CouchDB (in MB)

portworx_volume_name.title: Portworx volume name
portworx_volume_name.description: Name of the volume used with Portworx driver

portworx_volume_options.title: Portworx volume options
portworx_volume_options.description: Comma separated key=value pairs of options passed to Portworx driver

couchdb_image.title: CouchDB image name
couchdb_image.description: CouchDB image to use for the cluster

cluster_port.title: Cluster port
cluster_port.description: Port used by clients to talk to CouchDB

node_local_port.title: Node local port
node_local_port.description: Port used only for maintenance and administrative tasks

password.title: Admin password
password.description: Password of the CouchDB admin user

cookie.title: Cookie
cookie.description: Cookie used to form the Erlang cluster

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: Secret token used for proxy and cookie authentication
